name: LOVE2D creation
description:
Hello!

I am terraboi4, and this is my first game ever! I made it for the purpose of teaching myself LOVE2d. I know the code is a bit wonky, and I know there are some bugs in the game, and there's not a lot to do, but hey, it's still a game :). Please consider donating if you want to see BETTER games in the future! 

All assets EXCEPT for hearts and beakers and font are from 0x72.
